verses.roman:
jagadānanda cāhe āmā viṣaya bhuñjāite
yei kahe sei bhaye cāhiye karite

synonyms: jagadānanda—Jagadānanda; cāhe—wants; āmā—Me; viṣaya—sense gratification; bhuñjāite—to cause to enjoy; yei kahe—whatever he says; sei—that; bhaye—out of fear; cāhiye—I want; karite—to do.
translation: "Jagadānanda wants Me to enjoy bodily sense gratification, and out of fear I do whatever he tells Me.
